entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @afneil No it isn’t Andrew. Whether or not  China has been upfront about its own figures, we know from the death toll in both Italy and Spain - and now in the US - that coronavirus infection is both exponential and lethal. Anyone suggesting otherwise is ignoring the evidence.
